summary: An action-thriller in which an insurance salesman/ex-cop is caught up in a life-threatening conspiracy during his daily commute home.

title: Red Sparrow (2018)
actors: Jennifer Lawrence, Joel Edgerton, Matthias Schoenaerts
summary: Ballerina Dominika Egorova is recruited to 'Sparrow School,' a Russian intelligence service where she is forced to use her body as a weapon. Her first mission, targeting a C.I.A. agent, threatens to unravel the security of both nations.

title: Game Night (2018)
actors: Jason Bateman, Rachel McAdams, Kyle Chandler
summary: A group of friends who meet regularly for game nights find themselves entangled in a real-life mystery when the shady brother of one of them is seemingly kidnapped by dangerous gangsters.

title: Thoroughbreds (2017)
actors: Olivia Cooke, Anya Taylor-Joy, Anton Yelchin
summary: Two upper-class teenage girls in suburban Connecticut rekindle their unlikely friendship after years of growing apart. Together, they hatch a plan to solve both of their problems-no matter what the cost.

title: Den of Thieves (2018)
actors: Gerard Butler, Pablo Schreiber, O'Shea Jackson Jr.
summary: An elite unit of the LA County Sheriff's Dept. and the state's most successful bank robbery crew clash as the outlaws plan a seemingly impossible heist on the Federal Reserve Bank.

title: Maze Runner: The Death Cure (2018)
actors: Dylan O'Brien, Ki Hong Lee, Kaya Scodelario
summary: Young hero Thomas embarks on a mission to find a cure for a deadly disease known as "The Flare".

title: Hereditary (2018)
actors: Toni Collette, Milly Shapiro, Gabriel Byrne
summary: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

title: Isle of Dogs (2018)
actors: Bryan Cranston, Koyu Rankin, Edward Norton
summary: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

title: Mute (2018)
actors: Alexander Skarsgård, Paul Rudd, Justin Theroux
summary: A mute bartender goes up against his city's gangsters in an effort to find out what happened to his missing partner.

title: The Cloverfield Paradox (2018)
actors: Gugu Mbatha-Raw, David Oyelowo, Daniel Brühl
summary: Orbiting a planet on the brink of war, scientists test a device to solve an energy crisis, and end up face-to-face with a dark alternate reality.

title: Making a Murderer
actors: None
summary: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Tomb Raider (2018)
actors: Alicia Vikander, Dominic West, Walton Goggins
summary: Lara Croft (Alicia Vikander), the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father, Lord Richard Croft (Dominic West) disappeared.

title: Death Wish (2018)
actors: Bruce Willis, Vincent D'Onofrio, Elisabeth Shue
summary: Dr. Paul Kersey is an experienced trauma surgeon, a man who has spent his life saving lives. After an attack on his family, Paul embarks on his own mission for justice.

title: A Wrinkle in Time (2018)
actors: Storm Reid, Oprah Winfrey, Reese Witherspoon
summary: After the disappearance of her scientist father, three peculiar beings send Meg, her brother, and her friend to space in order to find him.

title: Love, Simon (2018)
actors: Nick Robinson, Jennifer Garner, Josh Duhamel
summary: Simon Spier keeps a huge secret from his family, his friends and all of his classmates: he's gay. When that secret is threatened, Simon must face everyone and come to terms with his identity.

title: A Quiet Place (2018)
actors: Emily Blunt, John Krasinski, Millicent Simmonds
summary: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

title: A Study in Pink
actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Rupert Graves
summary: War vet Dr. John Watson returns to London in need of a place to stay. He meets Sherlock Holmes, a consulting detective, and the two soon find themselves digging into a string of serial "suicides."

title: Blockers (2018)
actors: Leslie Mann, John Cena, Ike Barinholtz
summary: Three parents try to stop their daughters from losing their virginity on prom night.

title: Pacific Rim: Uprising (2018)
actors: John Boyega, Scott Eastwood, Cailee Spaeny
summary: Jake Pentecost, son of Stacker Pentecost, reunites with Mako Mori to lead a new generation of Jaeger pilots, including rival Lambert and 15-year-old hacker Amara, against a new Kaiju threat.

title: Rampage (2018)
actors: Dwayne Johnson, Naomie Harris, Malin Akerman
summary: When three different animals become infected with a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop them from destroying Chicago.

title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom (2018)
actors: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Rafe Spall
summary: When the island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

title: Tully (2018)
actors: Charlize Theron, Mackenzie Davis, Ron Livingston
summary: A struggling mother of three forms an unexpected bond with the night nanny hired to help with her newborn baby.

title: Incredibles 2 (2018)
actors: Craig T. Nelson, Holly Hunter, Sarah Vowell
summary: The Incredibles family takes on a new mission which involves a change in family roles: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) must manage the house while his wife Helen (Elastigirl) goes out to save the world.

title: Deadpool 2 (2018)
actors: Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Morena Baccarin
summary: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.

title: Solo: A Star Wars Story (2018)
actors: Alden Ehrenreich, Woody Harrelson, Emilia Clarke
summary: During an adventure into the criminal underworld, Han Solo meets his future co-pilot Chewbacca and encounters Lando Calrissian years before joining the Rebellion.

title: Anon (2018)
actors: Clive Owen, Afiya Bennett, Morgan Allen
summary: In a world without anonymity or crime, a detective meets a woman who threatens their security.

title: Ant-Man and the Wasp (2018)
actors: Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, Michael Peña
summary: As Scott Lang balances being both a superhero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.

title: Sicario: Day of the Soldado (2018)
actors: Benicio Del Toro, Josh Brolin, Isabela Merced
summary: The drug war on the U.S.-Mexico border has escalated as the cartels have begun trafficking terrorists across the US border. To fight the war, federal agent Matt Graver re-teams with the mercurial Alejandro.

title: Upgrade (2018)
actors: Logan Marshall-Green, Melanie Vallejo, Steve Danielsen
summary: Set in the near-future, technology controls nearly all aspects of life. But when the world of Grey, a self-labeled technophobe, is turned upside down, his only hope for revenge is an experimental computer chip implant.

title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout (2018)
actors: Tom Cruise, Henry Cavill, Ving Rhames
summary: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

title: Ocean's Eight (2018)
actors: Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett, Anne Hathaway
summary: Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's yearly Met Gala.

title: BlacKkKlansman (2018)
actors: John David Washington, Adam Driver, Laura Harrier
summary: Ron Stallworth, an African American police officer from Colorado Springs, CO, successfully manages to infiltrate the local Ku Klux Klan branch with the help of a Jewish surrogate who eventually becomes its leader. Based on actual events.
